feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 37 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
